args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: U-Bolts Securing Suspension May Break

Corp. Micro Bird, Inc. (Micro Bird) is recalling certain 2023 G5 transit buses.  The u-bolts securing the suspension blades may break.A broken bolt may allow the suspension to shift or detach, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 3.0"
